ai:cl.c: Represents a single socket connection to a client IP address.

ai:a.c: Read incoming data from a client socket.
ai:a.p: ERR acRead(*Object, APTR Buffer, INT Length, INT *Result)

ai:i.c: Points a buffer that will receive the data.
The total number of bytes to read from the object. This value cannot exceed the size of the Buffer.
The Read action will write this parameter with the total number of bytes read into the Buffer.

ai:a.p: ERR acWrite(*Object, APTR Buffer, INT Length, INT Result)

ai:i.c: A buffer containing the data that will be written to the object.
The total number of bytes to write to the object.
This parameter with be updated with the total number of bytes written from the Buffer.

ai:f.c: System time for the creation of this socket.
The current connection state of the ClientSocket object.
